short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get extra info in Funda!  WOZ, Valuation, Energylabel and history. Block useless listings and remove ads

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Don't waste your time guessing in Funda, now you can get WOZ, valuation and price information directly within Funda page.
Get price per square meter in search results and in saved results.
Block (and hide) listings that you don't want to see anymore.
Remove most of the annoying advertisements.
